QueryResult.text: select entity.id odf_pk, ENTITY.ID as entity_key, entity.ENTITY as entity_id, entity.SHORTDESC as entity, entity.HOME_CURRENCY_CODE as home_currency_code, entity.REPORTING_CURRENCY_CODE as reporting_currency_code, entity.BILLING_CURRENCY_CODE as billing_currency_code, ENTITY.created_date as clarity_created_date, ENTITY.last_updated_date as clarity_updated_date from entity entity where 1 = 1
